website_summaries.verdict: Easy to assemble, this low-profile beam gives you the feel of a competition beam at home. Be aware, though, that there are no options to adjust it for height.
pros: Rounded-edge wood core covered in durable synthetic suede
Base coated in soft rubber for safe stepping
Easy to assemble with two bolts and two washers
cons: There is no way to make this beam any higher as skills advance
Check underneath before use to make sure no metal is poking out around the staples

customer_reviews.title: No hardware- buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: No hardware arrived with this item. Extremely frustrated because my daughter’s birthday present isn’t functional. Explain that to my 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: E. Keefer

customer_reviews.title: Great beam for started and not only!
customer_reviews.text: Beam is well designed and made. It is very easy assembly. It is heavy enough to be very stable, but light enough for easy moving around the house. My daughter loves it and tales full benefit every day practicing on it. I do really recommend it, it is fairly inexpensive in comparison to other beams and your young gymnast will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous, but terrible delivery experience
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it a five but after buying it my delivery turned into a customer pick up which left me in the lurch and out an additional cost. They told me it was too big to deliver and wouldn't fit in their vehicles...not sure what I paid for then. As for the beam, its sturdy and soft and feels like the competition beams at the gym. My daughter loves it! As for durability, we haven't had it long enough to give it a rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and trained on it when I was younger. The beam itself is great, but I was originally disappointed to see a huge gash out of the leather. The packaging was not damaged, so the beam had to have been packed like that. I got in touch with the manufacturer Tumbl Trak and they were fantastic! They quickly took care of the issue, shipping a brand new beam and return label for us to ship the damages item back. Fantastic customer service, and fantastic beam!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Wolfert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Practice Beam(s)
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy. I purchased two and have come up with many configurations by having 2 in addition to positioning them end to end. I incline them onto blocks, set them up parallel to each other for locomotor skills, heavy duty well made balance beams with sturdy “flat” feet.
customer_reviews.author: Janet K.

customer_reviews.title: A good investment
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my beginner gymnast to practice on at home. It has a soft suede feel to it. It’s obviously good quality. It arrived with minimal assembly needs - we just had to attach the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Marie

customer_reviews.title: DAUGHTER LOVES THIS ITEM!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this yesterday on Sunday no less item was packed beautifully. 4 screws, 4 locking concave locking washers and a hex wrench. Daughter loves it and can't stop smiling. Would definitely purchase this again!!
customer_reviews.author: Army vet

customer_reviews.title: Great beam, very sturdy, well made
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old gymnast LOVES this beam! It is very sturdy and feels just like a regular beam. Easy to set up and not too heavy to move. Great product. Everything looks well made and that it will hold up to constant use, which is what it will have!
customer_reviews.author: Teniece Price-williams

customer_reviews.title: Great balance beam! Sturdy and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas over a year ago! She loves it and it’s still holding up really well!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with the right amount of cushion
customer_reviews.text: This beam is great! Nice and sturdy, perfect cushion vs stiffness. Our daughter loves this beam!
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Sturdy Construction
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our 5 and 9 year old who are both in gymnastics. It is perfect for them and I foresee this lasting a very long time, as the quality of the construction is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice beam
customer_reviews.text: My daughter competes level 3. This is the perfect size for her to practice at home.
customer_reviews.author: Littleteach1

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for gymnastics lovers
customer_reviews.text: Brought it is used off Amazon and so worth it. Kids are into gymnastics and the beam helps
customer_reviews.author: Daphney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect home beam for my aspiring gymnast
customer_reviews.text: Perfect home beam for my aspiring gymnast. Easy enough to move around the living room, but feels like a beam at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your little gymnast!
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy and sturdy. My daughter loves it. She practices on it often. Make sure you have room and mats!
customer_reviews.author: Tills

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this and it has improved her skills having this at home.
customer_reviews.author: dengle

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and authentic
customer_reviews.text: This beam serves my daughter well. She uses it constantly. Feels like the beams our gym uses, just shorter. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great practice beam.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Regulation size. Stabilizing legs are minimal but functional. My daughter loves practicing on it.
customer_reviews.author: NvrFulPrice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beam for any girl whose learning gymnastics
customer_reviews.text: Perfect beam for any girl whose learning gymnastics! My daughter is a level 4 gymnast and loves her beam.
customer_reviews.author: raerae

customer_reviews.title: “This feels like the beam at the meets”
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Good quality. My level 5 and level 2 gymnasts love this! First thing my level 5 daughter said when we pulled it out of the box was “This feels like the beam at the meets”.
customer_reviews.author: SARA G

customer_reviews.title: The high quality is unmistakeable. My daughter loves having ...
customer_reviews.text: The high quality is unmistakeable. My daughter loves having this beam and has greatly improved her skills through practice at home.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it. Uses it everyday, even ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Uses it everyday, even after spending hours at gymnastics. Its helped her improve greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Weste

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice beam off the floor a little the suede helps with slipping. Granddaughters love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise for kids.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! She uses it literally every day.
customer_reviews.author: September

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 9 year old who loves gymnastics. She loves it! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very stable. Easy to assemble. The kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: george purefoy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our granddaughter. Spends a lot of time on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beam!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the beam! Very easy to put the legs on. It’s perfect. Just like the one at my daughter gymnastics center. 100% perfect. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: TheLegend27

customer_reviews.title: This is a great at-home practice beam that is solid and looks very ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great at-home practice beam that is solid and looks very durable. Both of my daughters (ages 7 and 10) absolutely love it and have used it non-stop since it arrived. Wish it was a foot or two longer but not sure how that would change shipping options. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee D.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, very stable. Very happy with product, and value. My daughter of 12 loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made and heavy. My 6 year old loves it.

customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, durable and stable. Bought it for my 6 & 8 year old gymnasts.

customer_reviews.title: Not the cheapest not the most expensive but a great product for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her beam. Not the cheapest not the most expensive but a great product for the $$$

product_meta.title: Tumbl Trak Addie Beam (Beam)
product_meta.description: The NEW Addie Beam by Tumbl Trak is a practical and safe home gymnastics training beam that will help your athlete train and perfect beam skills. It's 8 feet long and competition width (10 center meters) – the perfect size for practicing leaps, turns, handstands and many more gymnastics skills. The Addie Beam is a perfect gymnastics beam for home or gym use.
feature_bullets: ✅TOP QUALITY - The Tumbl Trak Addie Beam is constructed from the highest quality materials. The rounded edge wood core is covered with super durable synthetic suede materials to give it a soft, smooth, and consistent feel throughout

✅DESIGNED FOR SAFETY - Tumbl Trak Addie Beam was designed with safety in mind keeps your athlete a safe distance from the ground. Each base of the Addie Beam is coated in a soft rubber material to ensure that it is safe for your athlete to step on

✅FAST ASSEMBLY - One great feature of the Addie Beam is that it is super easy to assemble. The rubber coated steel feet of the Addie Beam each only take(2) bolts and (2) washers to secure it! You can assemble and disassemble the Addie Beam in no time

✅THE COMPETITION FEEL-The top of the beam has a strong layer of 1/4in foam and with edges and corners which are rounded give the feeling quite similar to a competition beam. Transitioning from the Addie Beam to your gyms competition beam is a breeze

✅WE KNOW GYMNASTICS-When you purchase a Addie Beam from Tumbl Trak,you know that you’re getting a TRUE gymnastics product.Coaches,former gymnasts,and industry experts make up the Tumbl Trak Staff making the highest quality gymnastics products for 30 years
